main event: On April 12, 1958 in Bakersville, North Carolina, a satellite-like object was observed descending or falling, with a suspect descent or falling curve toward Earth.
interesting points: The sighting was described as a brilliantly lit globe with strange configuration and motion, different from anything previously seen.
Several residents also witnessed the object, which was slow and seemed to hover before taking off in a straight line.
The object was observed on Saturday night at around 9:30 PM, heading from north to south.
The observer requested information on the sighting due to their high level of interest.
The Department of the Navy acknowledged the observer's letter and forwarded the information to the Office of Naval Intelligence for evaluation and possible use.
